item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Introduction Datapio is composed of 3 main features: OpenCore: providing a Continuous Integration & Deplooyment platform MicroServices: providing a micro-service generation tool Pipelines: providing a Complex Event Processing pipeline generation tool What is OpenCore ? By plugging your Github repository to a Datapio project, you are able to deploy automatically your artifacts to your project environments. The datapio.yml file, that lies at the root of your repository, declares which branch is bound to which environment, as well as all the provided artifacts that must be deployed in that environment.
